# STATS::STAT_CLEAR_SLOT_FOR_RELOAD

## Summary
Call this on slot that has failed load and needs to be reloaded.

## Parameters
* **INT** slot

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Example:

for (v_2 = 0; v_2 <= 4; v_2 += 1) {
    STATS::STAT_CLEAR_SLOT_FOR_RELOAD(v_2);
}
